text.text: Empty spikes can be created in the metal forge. Different types will grant different powers, but also require killing different types of monsters to fill. Once full, the spike will begin to glow.
As a last resort, it is possible to create a spike from yourself. If its the right type, it will fully fill the spike, but will also cause you to permanently lose your ferring power.
Spikes can be used in either hand to kill monsters.
